action.description:
A value describing what action should be performed at this stop:
            HOOK = 1
            DROP = 2
            LOAD = 3
            UNLOAD = 4

trailer.description: The trailer for the action at this stop.

trailer_type.description: A value describing the type of trailer. NONE = 0 REEFER = 1 DRY_VAN = 2 FLATBED = 3 OTHER = 4
